content:
=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: India set to log record FII outflows as net sale hits Rs 1.58 lakh crore in 2025
Source: Economic Times - Stocks
Published: 2025-12-27 10:14
Related Stocks: General Market News
Categories: stocks

Summary:
Foreign investors are set to record their biggest-ever exit from Indian equities in 2025, with net outflows of over Rs 1.58 lakh crore, driven by exchange selling, rupee weakness and global capital shifts, despite steady domestic flows.

Sentiment: neutral
URL: https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/markets/stocks/news/india-set-to-log-record-fii-outflows-as-net-sale-hits-rs-1-58-lakh-crore-in-2025/articleshow/126203214.cms
